languages.text: {n}Собрание, на котором вы оказались, на первый взгляд кажется великосветски-респектабельным. Убранство и одежда гостей говорят о богатстве, как и местоположение, близкое к резиденции Наместника. Но заметно — большая часть присутствующих отличается внушительным телосложением. У многих видны шрамы и {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}импланты{/g} военного типа. Несколько гостей держатся так, чтобы контролировать выход. Некоторые явно прячут оружие...{/n}

{n}The gathering you've found yourself at seems refined and respectable at first glance. The decorations and the attendees' clothes speak of wealth, and so does the location, which isn't far from the Liege's residence. But you notice that most of those gathered are of rather imposing physique. Many of them have scars and military-grade {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implants{/g}. Several of the guests look like they are covering the exit. A few are clearly carrying concealed weapons...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Собрание, на котором вы оказались, на первый взгляд кажется великосветски-респектабельным. Убранство и одежда гостей говорят о богатстве, как и местоположение, близкое к резиденции Наместника. Но заметно — большая часть присутствующих отличается внушительным телосложением. У многих видны шрамы и {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}импланты{/g} военного типа. Несколько гостей держатся так, чтобы контролировать выход. Некоторые явно прячут оружие...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The gathering you've found yourself at seems refined and respectable at first glance. The decorations and the attendees' clothes speak of wealth, and so does the location, which isn't far from the Liege's residence. But you can tell that most of those gathered are of rather imposing physique. Many of them have scars and military-grade implants. Several of the guests look like they are covering the exit. A few are clearly carrying concealed weapons...{/n}

languages.text: {n}这场聚会乍看之下似乎很高雅，很有品味。会场装饰着奢华的装饰品，与会者也都穿着精美的衣服，这说明这场聚会有钱人举办的。除此之外，会场地点离总督的住处也很近。不过，你注意到，绝大部分聚在一起的客人，他们的体格都相当壮硕。客人之中许多人身上都带着伤疤，还配备着军事级别的{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}植入物{/g}。有几位客人看起来像是在出口那边放风，还有几个人显然携带了可以隐藏起来的武器……{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The gathering you've found yourself at seems refined and respectable at first glance. The decorations and the attendees' clothes speak of wealth, and so does the location, which isn't far from the Liege's residence. But you notice that most of those gathered are of rather imposing physique. Many of them have scars and military-grade {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implants{/g}. Several of the guests look like they are covering the exit. A few are clearly carrying concealed weapons...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}这场聚会乍看之下似乎很高雅，很有品味。会场装饰着奢华的装饰品，与会者也都穿着精美的衣服，这说明这场聚会有钱人举办的。除此之外，会场地点离总督的住处也很近。不过，你注意到，绝大部分聚在一起的客人，他们的体格都相当壮硕。客人之中许多人身上都带着伤疤，还配备着军事级别的{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}植入物{/g}。有几位客人看起来像是在出口那边放风，还有几个人显然携带了可以隐藏起来的武器……{/n}

languages.text: {n}El acontecimiento al que te has sumado parece refinado y respetable a primera vista. Las decoraciones y la ropa de los asistentes sugieren riqueza, al igual que la ubicación, cercana a la residencia del señor. Sin embargo, te das cuenta de que la mayoría de los presentes cuentan con un físico imponente. Muchos de ellos tienen cicatrices e {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implantes{/g} de categoría militar. Varios invitados parecen estar cubriendo la salida. Es evidente que algunos llevan armas ocultas...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The gathering you've found yourself at seems refined and respectable at first glance. Several of the guests look like they are covering the exit. A few are clearly carrying concealed weapons...{/n}

Sin embargo, te das cuenta de que la mayoría de los presentes cuentan con un físico imponente. Muchos de ellos tienen cicatrices e {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implantes{/g} de categoría militar. Varios invitados parecen estar cubriendo la salida. Es evidente que algunos llevan armas ocultas...{/n}

languages.text: {n}訪れた集会は一見すると上品で大層なものだった。装飾品や参加者の服装からして裕福さが伺えて、場所も領主の邸宅からそう遠くない。だが、よく見るとほとんどの参加者がなかなかに威圧的な風貌であることに気づく。ほとんどの者は傷痕があり、軍用の{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}インプラント{/g}を装着している。何人かは出口を警備しているようにも見える。明らかに武器を隠し持っている者もちらほらいる…{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The gathering you've found yourself at seems refined and respectable at first glance. The decorations and the attendees' clothes speak of wealth, and so does the location, which isn't far from the Liege's residence. But you notice that most of those gathered are of rather imposing physique. Many of them have scars and military-grade {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implants{/g}. Several of the guests look like they are covering the exit. A few are clearly carrying concealed weapons...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}訪れた集会は一見すると上品で大層なものだった。装飾品や参加者の服装からして裕福さが伺えて、場所も領主の邸宅からそう遠くない。だが、よく見るとほとんどの参加者がなかなかに威圧的な風貌であることに気づく。ほとんどの者は傷痕があり、軍用の{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}インプラント{/g}を装着している。何人かは出口を警備しているようにも見える。明らかに武器を隠し持っている者もちらほらいる…{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Versammlung, bei der du dich befindest, wirkt auf den ersten Blick gehoben und respektabel. Die Ausgestaltung und die Kleidung der Teilnehmer künden von Wohlstand, genau wie der Veranstaltungsort, unweit der Residenz des Lehnsherren. Aber dir fällt auf, dass die meisten hier einen recht imposanten Körperbau haben. Viele weisen Narben auf und verfügen über militärische {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}Implantate{/g}. Einige Gäste scheinen den Ausgang zu bewachen. Andere tragen zweifellos verborgene Waffen ...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The gathering you've found yourself at seems refined and respectable at first glance. But you notice that most of those gathered are of rather imposing physique. Many of them have scars and military-grade {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implants{/g}. Die Ausgestaltung und die Kleidung der Teilnehmer künden von Wohlstand, genau wie der Veranstaltungsort, unweit der Residenz des Lehnsherren. Aber dir fällt auf, dass die meisten hier einen recht imposanten Körperbau haben. Viele weisen Narben auf und verfügen über militärische {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}Implantate{/g}. Einige Gäste scheinen den Ausgang zu bewachen. Andere tragen zweifellos verborgene Waffen ...{/n}

languages.text: {n}De prime abord, cette petite réunion semble avoir été organisée sous le signe de la raffinerie et de la respectabilité : aussi bien les décorations que les tenues des personnes présentes exsudent l'opulence, sans parler du lieu en lui-même, situé non loin de la résidence du suzerain. En regardant de plus près, cependant, vous remarquez que chacun des participants est doté d'un physique assez imposant. Nombre d'entre eux arborent des cicatrices et des {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implants{/g} de qualité militaire. Plusieurs invités surveillent clairement les sorties, tandis que d'autres dissimulent des armes sous leurs vêtements...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The gathering you've found yourself at seems refined and respectable at first glance. Several of the guests look like they are covering the exit. A few are clearly carrying concealed weapons...{/n}

En regardant de plus près, cependant, vous remarquez que chacun des participants est doté d'un physique assez imposant. Nombre d'entre eux arborent des cicatrices et des {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implants{/g} de qualité militaire. Plusieurs invités surveillent clairement les sorties, tandis que d'autres dissimulent des armes sous leurs vêtements...{/n}

languages.text: {n}Kendini içinde bulduğun kalabalık, ilk bakışta saygın ve seçkin insanlardan oluşuyor gibi görünüyor. Etraftaki dekorasyon, Emîr'in evine hayli yakın olan bu mekân ve misafirlerin kıyafetleri, varlıklı olduklarını belli ediyor. Derken katılımcıların çoğunun heybetli fiziklere sahip olduğunu fark ediyorsun. Çoğunda yara izleri ve askerî düzey {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implantlar{/g} var. Misafirlerin birkaçı çıkışı koruyor gibi gözüküyor. Bazılarınınsa silah taşıdığı bariz ortada.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The gathering you've found yourself at seems refined and respectable at first glance. The decorations and the attendees' clothes speak of wealth, and so does the location, which isn't far from the Liege's residence. But you notice that most of those gathered are of rather imposing physique. Many of them have scars and military-grade {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implants{/g}. Several of the guests look like they are covering the exit. A few are clearly carrying concealed weapons...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Kendini içinde bulduğun bu kalabalık, ilk bakışta saygıdeğer ve önemli gözüküyor. Etraftaki dekorasyonlar, Emîr'in evine bir hayli yakın olan bu mekân ve misafirlerin kıyafetleri, varlıklı olduklarını belli ediyor. Sonra katılımcıların çoğunun heybetli bir fiziğe sahip olduğunu fark ediyorsun. Çoğunun bedeninde yaralar ve askerî düzey {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implantlar{/g} var. Misafirlerin birkaçı çıkışı koruyor gibi gözüküyor. Bazılarınınsa silah taşıdığı bariz ortada...{/n}
